title: description
Baauer's Tan Shake: An aged variant of the Fan Tan. As weathered as Baauer's harlem.

title: notes
Baauer's Tan Shake: Ginger, Brandy and a dash of eydo.

title: pairing
Baauer's Tan Shake: Baauer has it with a worn Plain Omelette and bomboloni.

title: serving_suggestion
Baauer's Tan Shake: Serve in a cocktail glass (4.5 oz). Drink to the passable sounds of Harlem Shake.
